adminCHDialog.title: Continue to map.geo.admin.ch
adminCHDialog.description:
On the official map of Swisstopo you have the full possibilities for further use of your addresses.

To do this, a file is downloaded "addresses.kml" which you can then import into the map by dragging it in.

Thus no addresses are stored online.
